title: ShopEase Web App
description: ShopEase is a dynamic and user-friendly e-commerce web application built with React, JavaScript, and Redux. With state management powered by Redux, ShopEase ensures real-time updates and a highly interactive user interface.

title: ShopEase Mobile App
description: This e-commerce mobile app, built with React Native, TypeScript, and Redux, offers a seamless shopping experience with an intuitive interface, real-time updates, and efficient state management. Users can browse products, manage carts, and enjoy fast performance and smooth navigation.

title: Loc's Personal Website
description: I built my personal website using React for a dynamic and interactive user interface, JavaScript for seamless functionality, and CSS Tailwind to design a clean, responsive layout.

title: GradTrack Web App
description: Using high level of ReactJS with Javascript to manipulate UI with dynamic data using MongoDB for organizing the employment information of graduate students.

title: ParkingApplication
description: This is a collaborative team project connecting Java Swing with MySQL to create a database that kept track of an organizationâ€™s parking lot.

title: OutOfGas
description: This Android application was to help drivers search nearby gas stations using GPS. This program implemented the Google Maps API to create a map view for users, and made calls to a web service to connect to a database.
